pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Machine Learning // Implements a spatial extension of the random forest algorithm (Georganos et al. (2019) doi:10.1080/10106049.2019.1595177). Allows for a geographically weighted random forest regression including a function to find the optical bandwidth. (Georganos and Kalogirou (2022) https://www.mdpi.com/2220-9964/11/9/471).
